verses.name: John 3:32
verses.text: And what he hath seen and heard, that he testifieth; and no man receiveth his testimony.

verses.name: John 3:33
verses.text: He that hath received his testimony hath set to his seal that God is true.

verses.name: John 3:34
verses.text: For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God: for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him.

verses.name: John 3:35
verses.text: The Father loveth the Son, and hath given all things into his hand.

verses.name: John 3:36
verses.text: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life: and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life; but the wrath of God abideth on him.
